thread.title: TV | Hidden Impact: Rugby and Concussion
thread.title_full: TV | Hidden Impact: Rugby and Concussion - entertainment.ie

author: entertainment.ie
title: TV | Hidden Impact: Rugby and Concussion
text: With rugby fever in full swing thanks to the World Cup, this RTE documentary takes a look at the ever-growing and troubling issue of concussion in the sport. Featuring interviews with Ronan O'Gara, Jonny Sexton, the first Irish professional rugby player forced to retire because of concussion John Fogarty, the documentary asks if enough is being done to protect players both on a school and international level, and, if you'll excuse the pun, is sure to be hard-hitting and a must watch.
